description: Schema for the Cryptic-seq nextflow workflow

common.title: Common options
common.description: Options that apply to both the Native and Snakemake pipelines.

ctb_id.description: Benchling CTB ID of the experiment.

genomes_json.description: Path to the JSON file with mappings from species to genome.

default_genome.description: The default genome to use if none is specified in the Metasheet.

fastq_dir.description: Path to the root folder containing FASTQ files.

fastq_name_pattern.description: The pattern used to match FASTQ files. May contain '${var}' placeholders, where 'var' is any column name from the metasheet, or 'read' for the read number (1 or 2).

attachment_sites.description: Path to the JSON file with mappings from Bencling PL ID to attachment site.

default_attachment_site.description: The default attachment site(s) to use if none is specified in the Metasheet.

references_dir.description: Path to the root folder containing reference files.

references_json.description: Path to the JSON file with mappings from genome to reference.

default_reference.description: The default reference to use if none is specified in the Metasheet.

annotation_reference.description: The name of, or path to, the reference to use when searching for exact site matches. Defaults to the default reference.

verify_files.description: Whether to verify that reference and FASTQ files exist when loading data from the metasheet.

prefix.description: The prefix to use for output files.

trim_Tn5_max_mismatches.description: The maximum number of mismatches to allow when trimming Tn5 adapters.

trim_att_max_mismatches.description: The maximum number of mismatches to allow when trimming attachment sites.

trim_Tn5_r2_min_score.description: The minimum alignment score for matching the R2 Tn5 adapter.

umi_from_read_name.description: Whether to extract the UMI from the read name instead of the sequence.

snakemake.title: Snakemake options
snakemake.description: Options specific to the Snakemake workflow

global_config.description: Path to the Snakemake global config file.

resources.title: Process resource options
resources.description: Resource options (Docker image, CPUs, memory, disk space, max runtime) for processes.
